subject: Baseball
Steroids
lead_paragraph: Barry Bonds will never outdistance all the footnotes and asterisks and doubts and suspicions in our minds, but he hit those homers, all 756 of them. It’s his record.
snippet: Barry Bonds will never outdistance all the footnotes and asterisks and doubts and suspicions in our minds, but he hit those homers, all 756 of them. It’s his record.
